title: DATA Challenge: Smart Data Usage
description: Make open administrative data practical and usable! Develop tools and concepts that provide citizens and administration with quick, user-friendly access to public data. Show how data can be aggregated, visualized, and prepared for individual needs.

title: AI FOR ADMINISTRATION
description: Shape the future of digital administration with sovereign AI! Develop innovative use cases for F13, the open-source AI assistant of the Saarland administration. Solve challenges like knowledge loss due to demographic change and optimize administrative processes.

title: Cyber Security Challenge
description: Think like an attacker, act as a defender! Test the Saarland Service Portal for security vulnerabilities and help make it more secure for all citizens. Find vulnerabilities, document them professionally, and contribute to digital security.
